creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: Recto: bearded man draped in fabric standing with his back turned, holding a staff in his outstretched PR hand Verso: a pope kneeling before a standing haloed figure holding an orb surmounted by a cross in his PR hand and supports another one on a pedestal to his left
medium: Pen and brown wash over black chalk on laid paper
title: Moses and the Crossing of the Red Sea (recto); A Pope Kneeling Before Christ as "Salvator Mundi" (verso)
